short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check the price of your favourite Crypto!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instantly view the current price and other data of your favorite cryptocurrencies without leaving the current page! 

Crypto Prices gives a simplistic overview of different coins for free, wherever you are on the internet. This means you can avoid leaving your cryptocurrency exchange tab open, using excessive memory and battery.
